name: @inkeep/agents-mcp
long_description: Inkeep Agents API: REST API for the Inkeep Agent Framework.

cookie_auth.title: cookieAuth
cookie_auth.description: The cookieAuth to use for the request

bearer_auth.title: bearerAuth
bearer_auth.description: The bearerAuth to use for the request

tools.name: health
tools.description:
Health check

Check if the management service is healthy

tools.name: capabilities
tools.description:
Get server capabilities

Get information about optional server-side capabilities and configuration.

tools.name: workflow-get-api-workflow-process
tools.description:
Process workflow jobs

Keeps the workflow worker active to process queued jobs (called by cron)

tools.name: user-organizations-get-manage-api-users-user-id-organizations
tools.description:
List user organizations

Get all organizations associated with a user

tools.name: user-organizations-post-manage-api-users-user-id-organizations
tools.description:
Add user to organization

Associate a user with an organization

tools.name: cli-get-manage-api-cli-me
tools.description:
Get CLI user info

Get the current authenticated user and their organization for CLI usage

tools.name: invitations-get-manage-api-invitations-pending
tools.description:
Get pending invitations

Get all pending (non-expired) invitations for a given email address

tools.name: projects-list-projects
tools.description:
List Projects

List all projects within a tenant with pagination. When authorization is enabled, only returns projects the user has access to.

tools.name: projects-create-project
tools.description:
Create Project

Create a new project. When authorization is enabled, the creator is automatically granted admin role.

tools.name: projects-get-project-by-id
tools.description:
Get Project

Get a single project by ID

tools.name: projects-update-project
tools.description:
Update Project

Update an existing project

tools.name: projects-delete-project
tools.description:
Delete Project

Delete a project and its branch. Must be called from the main branch.

tools.name: branches-list-branches
tools.description:
List Branches

List all branches within a project

tools.name: branches-create-branch
tools.description:
Create Branch

Create a new branch

tools.name: branches-get-branch
tools.description:
Get Branch

Get a single branch by name

tools.name: branches-delete-branch
tools.description:
Delete Branch

Delete a branch. Cannot delete protected branches like main.

tools.name: branches-list-branches-for-agent
tools.description:
List Branches for Agent

List all branches within a project that contain the agent

tools.name: refs-resolve-ref
tools.description:
Resolve Ref

Resolve a ref string (branch name, tag name, or commit hash) to its full resolved ref with type and commit hash. Pass the ref as a query parameter.

tools.name: project-members-list-project-members
tools.description:
List Project Members

List all users with explicit project access. Requires authz to be enabled.

tools.name: project-members-add-project-member
tools.description:
Add Project Member

Add a user to a project with a specified role. Requires authz to be enabled.

tools.name: project-members-update-project-member
tools.description:
Update Project Member Role

Update a project member's role. Requires authz to be enabled. Include previousRole to specify which role to revoke.

tools.name: project-members-remove-project-member
tools.description:
Remove Project Member

Remove a user from a project. Requires authz to be enabled. Pass role as query param to specify which role to revoke.

tools.name: project-permissions-get-project-permissions
tools.description:
Get Project Permissions

Get the current user's permissions for a project. Returns which actions the user can perform.

tools.name: sub-agent-external-agent-relations-list-sub-agent-external-agent-relations
tools.description: List Sub Agent External Agent Relations

tools.name: sub-agent-external-agent-relations-create-sub-agent-external-agent-relation
tools.description: Create Sub Agent External Agent Relation

tools.name: sub-agent-external-agent-relations-get-sub-agent-external-agent-relation-by-id
tools.description: Get Sub Agent External Agent Relation

tools.name: sub-agent-external-agent-relations-update-sub-agent-external-agent-relation
tools.description: Update Sub Agent External Agent Relation

tools.name: sub-agent-external-agent-relations-delete-sub-agent-external-agent-relation
tools.description: Delete Sub Agent External Agent Relation

tools.name: sub-agent-team-agent-relations-list-sub-agent-team-agent-relations
tools.description: List Sub Agent Team Agent Relations

tools.name: sub-agent-team-agent-relations-create-sub-agent-team-agent-relation
tools.description: Create Sub Agent Team Agent Relation

tools.name: sub-agent-team-agent-relations-get-sub-agent-team-agent-relation-by-id
tools.description: Get Sub Agent Team Agent Relation

tools.name: sub-agent-team-agent-relations-update-sub-agent-team-agent-relation
tools.description: Update Sub Agent Team Agent Relation

tools.name: sub-agent-team-agent-relations-delete-sub-agent-team-agent-relation
tools.description: Delete Sub Agent Team Agent Relation

tools.name: agent-artifact-component-relations-check-artifact-component-agent-association
tools.description: Check if Artifact Component is Associated with Agent

tools.name: agent-data-component-relations-check-data-component-agent-association
tools.description: Check if Data Component is Associated with Agent

tools.name: sub-agent-function-tool-relations-check-function-tool-sub-agent-association
tools.description: Check if Function Tool is Associated with SubAgent

tools.name: API-keys-list-api-keys
tools.description:
List API Keys

List all API keys for a tenant with optional pagination

tools.name: API-keys-create-api-key
tools.description:
Create API Key

Create a new API key for an agent. Returns the full key (shown only once).

tools.name: API-keys-get-api-key-by-id
tools.description:
Get API Key

Get a specific API key by ID (does not return the actual key)

tools.name: API-keys-update-api-key
tools.description:
Update API Key

Update an API key (currently only expiration date can be changed)

tools.name: API-keys-delete-api-key
tools.description:
Delete API Key

Delete an API key permanently

tools.name: full-agent-create-full-agent
tools.description:
Create Full Agent

Create a complete agent with all agents, tools, and relationships from JSON definition

tools.name: full-agent-get-full-agent
tools.description:
Get Full Agent

Retrieve a complete agent definition with all agents, tools, and relationships

tools.name: full-agent-update-full-agent
tools.description:
Update Full Agent

Update or create a complete agent with all agents, tools, and relationships from JSON definition

tools.name: full-agent-delete-full-agent
tools.description:
Delete Full Agent

Delete a complete agent and cascade to all related entities (relationships, not other agents/tools)

tools.name: MCP-catalog-list-mcp-catalog
tools.description:
List MCP Server Catalog

Get a list of available prebuilt MCP servers. If COMPOSIO_API_KEY is configured, also includes Composio servers for the tenant/project.

tools.name: third-party-MCP-servers-get-third-party-mcp-server
tools.description:
Get Third-Party MCP Server Details

Fetch details for a specific third-party MCP server (e.g., Composio) including authentication status and connect URL

tools.name: third-party-MCP-servers-get-oauth-redirect-url
tools.description:
Get OAuth Redirect URL

Get the OAuth redirect URL for a third-party MCP server. Call this after scope selection to get the correct URL for the selected scope.

tools.name: evaluations-list-dataset-items
tools.description: List Dataset Items by Dataset ID

tools.name: evaluations-get-evaluation-job-config
tools.description: Get Evaluation Job Config by ID

tools.name: evaluations-get-evaluation-job-config-results
tools.description: Get Evaluation Results by Job Config ID

tools.name: evaluations-list-evaluation-job-config-evaluators
tools.description: List Evaluators for Evaluation Job Config

tools.name: evaluations-add-evaluator-to-job-config
tools.description: Add Evaluator to Evaluation Job Config

tools.name: evaluations-remove-evaluator-from-job-config
tools.description: Remove Evaluator from Evaluation Job Config

tools.name: evaluations-get-evaluation-run-config
tools.description: Get Evaluation Run Config by ID

tools.name: evaluations-get-evaluation-run-config-results
tools.description: Get Evaluation Results by Run Config ID

tools.name: evaluations-get-evaluation-suite-config
tools.description: Get Evaluation Suite Config by ID

tools.name: evaluations-list-evaluation-suite-config-evaluators
tools.description: List Evaluators for Evaluation Suite Config

tools.name: evaluations-add-evaluator-to-suite-config
tools.description: Add Evaluator to Evaluation Suite Config

tools.name: evaluations-remove-evaluator-from-suite-config
tools.description: Remove Evaluator from Evaluation Suite Config

tools.name: evaluations-evaluate-conversation
tools.description: Trigger evaluation on a single conversation

tools.name: evaluations-start-conversations-evaluations
tools.description: Trigger evaluations on conversations with specified evaluators

tools.name: user-project-memberships-list-user-project-memberships
tools.description:
List User Project Memberships

List all projects a user has explicit access to and their role in each. Requires authz to be enabled.

tools.name: full-project-create-full-project
tools.description:
Create Full Project

Create a complete project with all Agents, Sub Agents, tools, and relationships from JSON definition

tools.name: full-project-get-full-project
tools.description:
Get Full Project

Retrieve a complete project definition with all Agents, Sub Agents, tools, and relationships

tools.name: full-project-update-full-project
tools.description:
Update Full Project

Update or create a complete project with all Agents, Sub Agents, tools, and relationships from JSON definition

tools.name: full-project-delete-full-project
tools.description:
Delete Full Project

Delete a complete project and cascade to all related entities (Agents, Sub Agents, tools, relationships)

tools.name: full-project-get-full-project-with-relation-ids
tools.description:
Get Full Project with Relation IDs

Retrieve a complete project definition with all Agents, Sub Agents, tools, and relationships

tools.name: O-auth-initiate-oauth-login-public
tools.description:
Initiate OAuth login for MCP tool

Detects OAuth requirements and redirects to authorization server (public endpoint)

tools.name: O-auth-mcp-oauth-callback
tools.description:
MCP OAuth authorization callback

Handles OAuth authorization codes for MCP tools and completes the authentication flow

tools.name: webhooks-post-run-tenants-tenant-id-projects-project-id-agents-agent-id-triggers-trigger-id
tools.description:
Invoke agent via trigger webhook

Webhook endpoint for third-party services to invoke an agent via a configured trigger

tools.name: workflows-run-dataset-items
tools.description:
Run dataset items

Runs dataset items for processing through the chat API

tools.name: workflows-evaluate-conversations-by-job
tools.description:
Trigger evaluations on conversations by evaluation job config

Filters conversations based on job filters, creates an evaluation run, and enqueues workflows
